name: Our Last Stand: the Arena
description:
Our Last Stand the Arena initial release date is July 2017 back then it's using Indonesian for language. and for testing.
the Arena is a mini game/demo for our main game INDIGOGO Crowfunding project "Our Last Stand".
i (Habib) make and develop it for my team name  "Nusantara Free Creative"

STORY :
6 Month after the Outbreak in the City of Rendah, Indonesia. Join Survivor group called "Last Stand" as they struggle to maintain the security of their new home base when a bandit group called "Begal" spreading terror across quarantine area.

FEATURE :

-4 different Weapons (2 Firearms : Vector.45 & M14 rifle, Melee : Sharp Bamboo & Golok Machete)
-4 different Playable Characters
-each character have different combo
-4 repeatable mission (because this game meant to be a Demo)
-and MANY MORE! (and yeah ofcourse Easter Eggs, still dont know it's a feature or what)

NEW FEATURE IN V5 : INFECTED MODE : be the Zombie and hunt and kill the Survivors!

SPECS  :
Minimum :
-i3 (3th gen) 1.8 Ghz.
-Ram 2GB.
-Nvidia/Amd Graphic Cards.

Recomended :
-i3 (5th gen) / i5 2.1 Ghz.
-Ram 4GB.
-Nvidia Gt 920m (laptop) equal or above.
